         Buy Photos\n                </a></li><li>\n                <a href=\"/support/\">\n                    \n                    Support Center\n                </a></li></ul></li></ul></div>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n            \n        </nav>\n        \n    </div>\n    \n        \n            <script>\n                jQuery(document).ready(function($){\n                    var sNavContainer = '#site-navbar-container';\n                    var sBodyContainer = '#main-body-container';\n                    var sNavHeight = $(sNavContainer).height();\n                    var iUnfixPoint = 0;\n                    if( __tnt.client.platform.ios ){\n                        $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix-sticky');\n                    } else {\n                        $sNavScroll = false;\n                        $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){\n                            if( !$sNavScroll ){\n                                $sNavScroll = true;\n                                setTimeout(function(){\n                                    var iFixPoint = $(sNavContainer).offset().top;\n                                    var iCurrPoint = $(this).scrollTop();\n                                    if( iCurrPoint >= iFixPoint && iCurrPoint > iUnfixPoint ){\n                                        if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix') ){ \n                                            iUnfixPoint = iFixPoint;\n                                            $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix').removeClass('affix-top');\n                                            $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', sNavHeight+'px'); \n                                        }\n                                    } else {\n                                        if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix-top') ){ \n                                            $(sNavContainer).removeClass('affix').addClass('affix-top');\n                                            $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', 0);\n                                        }\n                                    }\n                                    $sNavScroll = false;\n                                }, 25);\n                            }\n                        });\n                    }\n                });\n            </script>\n        \n    \n    <div                         \n                                        <li class=\"text-muted\"><span id=\"author-8415a096-50de-11e5-a76b-9fb914b43399-asset-cd7c5f4d-928c-514f-a82c-b8bd88a10379\"     \n                        <div class=\"card-lead\">\n                            <p>The magisterial courts in Perkasie and Lower Southampton will be closed by the end of the year, the state Supreme Court ruled Friday.</p>\n                        </div>\n                        \n                    \n                    \n                    <style>\n        #block-467917     \n                        \n                        <div class=\"card-lead\">\n                            <p>Young adults with autism are successfully entering the workforce.  \n                    <div class=\"card-headline\">\n                        \n    <h3 class=\"\">\n        \n             <a href=\"/news/local/csx-transportation-ordered-to-pay-fine-in-latest-clash-with/article_14ba3a38-260f-11e7-91a8-9feb6b68f14b.html?hp=mid-moretopstories\">\n        \n        \n        \n\n        CSX transportation ordered to pay fine in latest clash with Middletown\n        \n            </a>\n        \n    </h3>\n                    </div>\n                    \n                        <div class=\"card-meta\">\n                            <ul class=\"list-inline\">\n                                \n                                \n                                    \n                                    \n                                        <li class=\"text-muted\"><span id=\"author-5fc138d2-cc88-11e6-b7a1-2b668fcfd92c-asset-14ba3a38-260f-11e7-91a8-9feb6b68f14b\"                     \n                            </ul>\n                        </div>\n                    \n                    \n                    \n                        \n                        \n                        <div class=\"card-lead\">\n                            <p>CSX Transportation was ordered to pay a $137.46 fine after a district judge found the company guilty of blocking the railroad crossing near the SEPTA Woodbourne station for more than 15 minutes on Feb. 1. The citation is just one of 16 motor vehicle code citations issued against CSX by Middletown police since 2015.</p>\n                        </div>\n                        \n                    \n  \n                    <div class=\"card-headline\">\n                        \n    <h3 class=\"\">\n        \n             <a href=\"/news/local/photos-robert-k-shafer-middle-school-eighth-graders-dance-the/collection_85c52ca0-2697-11e7-a0d6-d74e3fb00d6c.html?hp=mid-moretopstories\">\n        \n        \n        \n\n        Photos: Robert K. Shafer Middle School eighth-graders dance the classics\n        \n            </a>\n        \n    </h3>\n                    </div>\n                    \n                        <div class=\"card-meta\">\n                            <ul class=\"list-inline\">\n                                \n                                \n                                    \n                                    \n                                \n                                \n                                \n                            </ul>\n                        </div>\n                    \n                    \n                    \n                        \n                        \n                        <div class=\"card-lead\">\n                            <p>Eighth-graders at Robert K. Shafer Middle School in Bensalem performed classic dances Friday during the culminating event of a 10-week program</p>\n                        </div>\n                        \n                    \n                    \n                    <style>\n        #block-467915 .additional-content {\n            \n            text-shadow:none;\n        }\n        #block-467915 .additional-content a {\n            \n            text-shadow:none;\n        } \n        #block-467915 .additional-content.horizontal-list {\n            font-weight:bold;\n        }\n        #block-467915 .additional-content.h4 {\n            line-height:22px;\n        }\n        #block-467915 .additional-content.h5 {\n            line-height:18px;\n        }\n        #block-467915 .additional-content.h6 {\n            line-height:16px;\n        }\n        #block-467915 .additional-content ul {\n            padding-left:20px;\n        }\n        #block-467915 .additional-content li {\n            padding:0px 0px 5px 0px;\n        }\n    </style>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n            <div class=\"clearfix\"></div>\n        </article>\n                \n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                \n                </div>\n                \n                    \n                        <div class=\"clearfix hidden-xs\"></div>\n                    \n                \n            \n        \n        <div class=\"clearfix hidden-xs\"></div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n    </section>\n    \n\n    </div><div id=\"tncms-block-508138\" class=\"tncms-block topstorylist unwellhome\">\n\n    \n        <style>\n            \n                #block-508138 .card-panel {\n                    background-color: #ffffff; border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.08);\n                }\n            \n            \n        </style>\n    \n\n    <section id=\"block-508138\" class=\"block emphasis-h4  \">\n        \n        <div class=\"clearfix\">\n    \n    <div class=\"block-title title-508138 \">\n        <div class=\"block-title-inner\">\n            <h4>\n                \n                    <a href=\"http://www.buckscountycouriertimes.com/news/horsham-pfos?hp=bottom-unwellhome\">\n                \n                A public service project of the Bucks County Courier Times\n                \n                    </a>\n                \n            </h4>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n    <div class=\"block-note block-note-508138 text-muted\">\n        <p>Since 2014, 21 public drinking water wells and more than 150 private wells in Bucks and Montgomery Counties have been shut down due to contamination by unregulated chemical compounds PFOA and PFOS, affecting the drinking water of more than 100,000 people. The Bucks County Courier Times and Calkins Media have been investigating and writing extensively on the topic. You can follow developments of our Unwell Water series here.</p>\n    </div>\n\n        </div>\n        \n    \n    \n        <div class=\"card-panel panel\">\n            <div class=\"panel-body\">\n });\n            }\n\n            /* handle form submission */\n            $('#calendar-featured-search-467309 .search-submit').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){\n                $('#calendar-featured-search-467309 .search-submit .fa').removeClass('fa-search').addClass('fa-spinner fa-spin');\n                $('#calendar-featured-search-467309').submit();\n                return false;\n            });\n\n            $('#d1, #d2').datepicker({\n                format:'yyyy-mm-dd',\n                todayHighlight: true,\n                startDate: '+0d',\n                autoclose: 'true'\n            });\n            /* handle form submission */\n            $('#calendar-featured-search-467309').find('.btn-submit').on('click', function(){\n                $('#calendar-featured-search-467309').submit();\n            });\n\n            $('#calendar-featured-search-467309').on('submit', function(){\n                /* get all the checked flags and out put them to the fl input with a value like 'val1 AND val2' */\n                var aSelectedFlags = [];\n                $('.cal-flag:checked').each(function(index, element){\n                    aSelectedFlags.push( $(this).val() );\n                });\n                $(this).find('#fl').val( aSelectedFlags.join(' AND ') );\n            });\n        });\n    </script>\n    \n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    \n    <div class=\"clearfix\"></div>\n</div>\n</section>\n    \n    <script>\n        $(function() {\n            /* toggle overlay when form is hidden */\n            $('#calendar-featured-search-467309-collapse').on('hide.bs.collapse', function(event){\n                advancedDisplay467309();\n            });\n            /* toggle off overlay when form is show and larger than the image */\n            $('#calendar-featured-search-467309-collapse').on('show.bs.collapse', function(event){\n                advancedDisplay467309();\n            });\n\n            $('#search-form-467309 #d1, #search-form-467309 #d2').on('show.bs.collapse', function(event){\n                event.stopPropagation();\n            });\n            $('#search-form-467309 #d1, #search-form-467309 #d2').on('hide.bs.collapse', function(event){\n                event.stopPropagation();\n            });\n        });\n        function advancedDisplay467309() {\n            $('#block-467309 .centered-content').toggleClass('content-background').toggleClass('well');\n        }\n    </script>\n</div></div><div
